ygData.subject: Re: Being human and language
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are in Freeport... There are three different people around the Guild in Freeport who can train you.  Check all three and that should open up
ygData.messageBody:
If you are in Freeport...

There are three different people around the Guild in Freeport who can train
you. Check all three and that should open up possibilites for you...

Soren


Charles Huang wrote:

> From: Charles Huang <ChazHuang@...>
>
> Hi, I am a level 6 human wizard. I noticed that my only choice for
> language currently is the Common one. Will I ever be able to learn
> other languages? In not, would that affect my ability to perform
> research down the line since that apparantly requires familiarity with
> certain languages?
>
> Thanks in advance
>
> Human Wizard, Muldor
> Innoruuk server
>
